entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json_middleware #61350
  • Quarantine OpenApiAddURLTests.OpenApi_Add_URL_FileAlreadyExists_Fail & OpenApi_Add_Url_SameName_UniqueFile #61348
  • The right way of getting http request body from metric handler #61347
  • Perf regression: json #61345
  • Perf regression: kestrel-header-symbols, mvc, updates #61344

Closed

  • Update the AspNetCore.sln solution to the new SLNX format #61269
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #61346
  • Perf regression: single_query, tls-handshakes-kestrel #61329
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #61340

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine OpenAPI tests #61349
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • Migrating to the new solution file format - .slnx #61273
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor
  • Use Copy Constructor for JsonSerializerSettings #61251
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having a single place for registering interceptors, conventions, entity type configurations, etc #35908
  • Generate services from the DI container #35907
  • Cosmos bug: .Where(x => x.Id == null) gets skipped from query. #35906

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • The Error list does not show the the number of errors, when the option of intelliscense plus build is selected #77021

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Merge wpf down2 #78020
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review

Merged

  • Fix EA layering for Razor.ExternalAccess #77927

Updated

  • WIP Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Be resilient to (and report) exceptions we encounter when calling into 3rd party extensions in a gladstone context. #78014
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: A mechanism for disabling managed debugging at compile time #114313
  • [API Proposal]: Public API for the Runtime Async #114310
  • IL206/ IL2070/IL2090 Linker errors when trimming/AOTing around enums #114307
  • Using IMetaDataEmit::DeleteToken causes the runtime to hang #114306
    10.0.0
  • AltJIT as a single lib for a given host #114305
    Future

Closed

  • c0000005 at SHA256.HashData #114219
  • 25% regression in string search benchmark #106624
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [clr-interp] Implement a few minor opcodes #114312
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip rarely-run block expansion during flow opts when we have profile data #114311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ML-KEM: EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo exports #114304
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 135.0.7049.52, windows: 135.0.7049.42 #114303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Revert "Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div…" #114308
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][interp] alias operators too #114293
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [clr-interp] Refactor passing of configuration environment variables #114300
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Add DivRem with DivisionRounding (WIP + Review request) #104589
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [TEST] No-op comment change #114048
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2680495 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `sh(x)add(.uw)` instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix RISC-V Windows build #114292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Remove CreateFalse node during lowering, if MaskToVector is getting removed #114272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rewrite It_retries_on_failure_to_create_apphost test in AppHost.cs #48202

Closed

  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, Version=6.0.1.0 on Framework leg #48036
  • `_MTPBuild` target is duplicated #48095

PullRequests

Merged

  • Simplify logic around _MTPBuild target #48097

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48203

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48150

  • Use global temp directory for run file outputs #48169
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • dotnet CLI: Consolidate ResX files #48199

  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
